DOC.brief_summary: The purpose PaTH Network AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort use clinical data electronic health record ( EHR ) patient report outcome ( PRO ) answer question clinical importance patient , provider , stakeholder .
DOC.brief_title: PaTH Clinical Data Research Network ( CDRN ) Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective create PaTH Network AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort , allow conduct patient-centered observational study AF across multiple institution PaTH network . Creating AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort involve : 1 . Recruiting patient AF participate PaTH Network AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort 2 . Administering survey AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort approximately every 6 month collect patient report outcomes ( PROs ) 3 . Collecting individual patient health record data AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort database 4 . Tracking whether patient participant biospecimens PaTH site biorepository prepare possible sharing biospecimens future study . 5 . Identifying potential participant future research study . The secondary objective use PaTH Network AF Clinician-Patient Partnership Cohort answer patient-centered research question include : 1 . What incidence complication require re-hospitalization ablation procedure AF ? 2 . What predictors major bleed stroke among patient receive anticoagulant class ( vit K antagonist , direct factor X inhibitor , direct thrombin inhibitor ) ? 3 . Is longitudinal change apply cognition-executive function score AF patient associated choice rate versus rhythm control anticoagulation strategy ?
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 year old time query Visits : 3 nonED outpatient visit 1/1/2011 12/31/2014 AF : AF diagnosis document 1/1/2011 12/31/2014 AF diagnosis cod EHR ( bill problem list ) and/or derive EKG report AF diagnosis associate surgery , certain thyroid condition , certain medication count qualify AF diagnosis inclusion cohort . Deceased Not proficient English Already enrol PaTH Clinical Data Research Network ( CDRN ) Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) ClinicianPatient Partnership Cohort another PaTH institution
